meanings.sent1: The bearskin was soft and furry.
meanings.sent2: The hunter proudly displayed the bearskin he had obtained.
meanings.sent3: The bearskin made a cozy blanket for the cold winter nights.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm as a bearskin in front of a fireplace.
meanings.sent5: The bearskin rug added a touch of nature to the room.

meanings.definition: A tall, fur hat worn by certain military units.
meanings.sent1: The soldier's bearskin hat made him stand out in the parade.
meanings.sent2: The ceremonial guards wore bearskin hats with pride.
meanings.sent3: The bearskin hat looked like a fluffy cloud on the soldier's head.
meanings.sent4: Her ambition was as tall as a bearskin hat.
meanings.sent5: The bearskin hat shielded the soldier from the sun.

meanings.definition: A type of rug made from a bear's skin.
meanings.sent1: The luxurious bearskin rug added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The cabin had a rustic charm with the bearskin rug on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The bearskin rug was so soft, it felt like walking on clouds.
meanings.sent4: His words were as comforting as a bearskin rug on a cold night.
meanings.sent5: The bearskin rug was a conversation starter at the party.
